title: Kidnapping by Indians
wiki_plot: The plot concerns an attack by Native Americans on a camp where white people are staying. The attackers set fire to the camp and kidnap a young girl. Some cowboys arrive and a gunfight begins. The captured girl is rescued by the cowboys. The BFI suggests the film may be a scene from a larger stage production.
tmdb_plot: Kidnapping by Indians is a 1899 British silent short Western film, made by the Mitchell and Kenyon film company, shot in Blackburn, England. It is believed to be the first Western film, pre-dating Edwin S. Porter's The Great Train Robbery by four years.

title: Summoning the Spirits
wiki_plot: A magician hangs a wreath in the air and makes a grotesque face appear inside it. He then replaces it with a woman's face, and finally with a copy of his own face.
tmdb_plot: A bearded man hangs up a wreath and, like any good magician, waves his hands inside of it and under it to show us it's only a wreath…

title: The Conjurer
wiki_plot: A conjuror and a ballet dancer perform a quick series of magic acts, including disappearances, reappearances, and transformations.
tmdb_plot: A film from Méliès has him playing a magician who does a few tricks including making a woman disappear.
